sentence: The former president has also leveled some of his harshest personal attacks on the state's two Republican officials Governor Brian Kemp and Secretary of State Brad Raffensperger who blocked his attempt to claim a victory over President Joe Biden in the state.
author: Daniel Bush
title: Georgia Primaries Will Test Trump's Revenge Campaign Against GOP Incumbents

author: David Weigel
title: Kemp, Raffensperger win in blow to Trump and his false election claims

sentence: On Tuesday, Georgia Governor Brian Kemp comprehensively beat the Trump-backed David Perdue in the gubernatorial primary by more than 50 percentage points.
author: Ewan Palmer
title: Trump Still Likely to Get Revenge on Liz Cheney, Despite Brian Kemp Setback
As Cheney files for reelection, poll from rival group shows her trailing badly

author: Bob Brigham
title: 'Party of me': Chris Christie rips Trump's selfishness

sentence: Georgia's GOP Governor Brian Kemp and Secretary of State Brad Raffensperger, who drew the former president's wrath after they declined to help him overturn President Joe Biden's 2020 election win in their state, both won their primaries by double-digit margins on Tuesday.
author: Jason Lemon
title: Liz Cheney's Chances of Beating Trump-Backed Harriet Hageman in Wyoming

sentence: The southern state's GOP Governor Brian Kemp and Secretary of State Brad Raffensperger, who drew the former president's ire after they refused to help him overturn President Joe Biden's election win in their state, both won their primaries by double-digit margins.
author: Jason Lemon
title: Trump Targets Cheney in Wyoming Rally as Endorsement, Court Failures Sting

author: Oma Seddiq
title: Trump targets Liz Cheney at Wyoming rally days after his high-profile endorsements flopped

author: Josh Dawsey
title: After losses in Ga., Trump sets sights on ousting Liz Cheney in Wyo.
